HomePage.title: Hello, I'm
HomePage.name: Andrew
HomePage.subtitle: Frontend developer
HomePage.description: I build fast and clean web apps with React & Next.js.

AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.text1-part1: I'm a 20 year old frontend developer from
AboutMe.text1-part2: with experience in React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS. I build fast, responsive, and clean web applications.
AboutMe.text2: I started learning frontend in 2022 and since then I’ve worked on personal projects, small client websites, and interactive applications.
AboutMe.text3: I participated in a web development competition where our team built a booking system for teachers. We used PHP, HTML5, and CSS3, coding all the logic manually without frameworks. We advanced through the first round.
AboutMe.text4: The following year, I joined a different team and developed a Tic Tac Toe platform using Python Django, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and API integration. Again, we made it through the first round. These experiences led me to focus on modern technologies such as React and Next.js. Currently, I’m working on several projects with my colleague

Timeline.text1: I started with HTML & CSS, later JavaScript.
Timeline.text2: Tour de App competition: Handcoded reservation system in PHP.
Timeline.text3: Tour de App competition: Tic Tac Toe with Django, TS and Tailwind.
Timeline.text4: I started focusing on React & Next.js.
Timeline.text5: Collaboration with Galfar on some projects.

Projects.title: Featured projects
Projects.text: Have a look on some projects I've worked on so far.

tv-rozvrh.title: Multi-use hours scheduler for my school
tv-rozvrh.description: A multi-use hours scheduler for my school, allowing students to see what classes they have today, how many hours and which teacher is teaching them. Also include bus departures and announcements.

tda25.title: Tic tac toe platform
tda25.description: Tic tac toe platform for web developing contest Tour de App, where I learnt a lot about web development.

mesosweb.title: A school website - MěSOŠ Klobouky u Brna
mesosweb.description: Created using template blocks in WordPress

travasstineni.title: A website for my first client
travasstineni.description: The client specializes in the installation and service of shading equipment

urvtek.title: A website for UrvTek
urvtek.description: This website is a platform for upcoming music competition made by UrvTek. Collaborating with Galfar.

gamedex.title: A website for Rook Rules
gamedex.description: This website is a PokeDex of games Rook has played on stream so far. It features simple info about the game and brief description of the game. Also includes admin dashboard for actually importing these cards to display them in Game Dex. Collaborating with Galfar.

flock.title: Flock™ web application
flock.description: This web application is a platform for messaging with friends. It is still in the beginning of its development. Collaborating with Galfar.

sidebyside.title: SideBySide web application
sidebyside.description: This web application is a platform for sharing and managing content with your partner. It is still in the development.

TechStack.title: Tech stack
TechStack.text: Here is my overview of technologies I've worked with and their experience levels.

Contact.title: Interested in collaboration?
Contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me
Contact.name: Name

name.tooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

message.tooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters

Contact.submitSuccess: Wait for a reply in your email inbox.
